amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove the restrictions on abortions under the Federal Employee Health Benefit Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed in the Congressional Record of July 16, 1996, to delete the provisions of the billwhich prohibit federal empployee health care plans from covering abortion services, except when the woman's life is endangered.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoyer amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 238 (Roll no. 320).
